name: PHASESamplerNodeDefinition
desc: A node that plays complete audio data.

items.name: init(soundAssetIdentifier: String, mixerDefinition: PHASEMixerDefinition)
items.desc: Creates a sampler node with the given sound asset and mixer.

items.name: init(soundAssetIdentifier: String, mixerDefinition: PHASEMixerDefinition, identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a named sampler node with the given sound asset and mixer.

items.name: var assetIdentifier: String
items.desc: The name of the audio this node plays.

items.name: var cullOption: PHASECullOption
items.desc: The action the engine performs after it temporarily removes the node's sound from the audio output.

items.name: enum PHASECullOption
items.desc: The actions the engine takes when it culls sound.

items.name: var playbackMode: PHASEPlaybackMode
items.desc: An option that determines whether the node's audio plays in a loop.
